messages.title: OUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems can provide the strong opposition Britain needs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A vote for the Liberal Democrats will deliver a strong opposition to the Tories on the NHS, schools, and jobs.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party, Theresa May
mentions.tacticalSituation: If the choice is between Labour under Jeremy Corbyn and the Conservatives under Theresa May, only the Liberal Democrats will provide a strong opposition to this hardline Conservative Government.

issues.brexitEurope: If you care about the way things are going on Brexit and on the NHS, then this is your moment. The choice could not be clearer.
issues.health: Only a vote for the Liberal Democrats will deliver a strong opposition to the Tories on the NHS, schools, and jobs.

leaflet.personalStatement: This is your chance to change Britain's future.

images.caption: OUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE leaflet image

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. Only the Liberal Democrats can stand up to the Tories and change the direction of our country. If you want an open, tolerant and united Britain, vote Lib Dem on 8th June.
